issue.title: [Packaging] libarrow-gpu10 deb for Ubuntu 18.04 has broken dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3007](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3007). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
